Notes.*: Create a google-optimized chain of words for your URL. Typically you would use the title and some keywords, then add some hyphens + use lower case. Example would be create-simple-blog-app-in-15-minutes-video.
This is when this post is released - date/time. It won't be shown on lists before this time, and this also affects sorting in most cases.
This is the main part of your post.

This contains all the designed content-elements like galleries, responsively layouted elements, qr-codes, sliders or whatever. Usually you edit all this from the details-page of the post, this is just here in case you want to do something more complex with the data.
Short text for use in most list-views.
The main image for this post - commonly used in list-views etc.
If it's square or tall, the preview will resize differently

The post category - one is required. Note that categories rarely change, and if they do, the site-admin usually wants to add new pages listing just the items of this category etc. This is why creating new categories is disabled in this dialog.
Tags which give this post more meaning and help connect it to other posts.
Optional values - if not specified, will automatically use title, teaser etc.

The following information is used in sharing scenarios. If you would like to know more, read about it at Open Graph. If you leave these fields empty, other fields like the teaser will be used automatically.
Max. 140 characters because this is what twitter would pick up
